tooltip.spanishdelight.squid_ring: Obtained by killing a squid with any knife

tooltip.spanishdelight.paella.desc: The most international Spanish dish. Don't add chorizo!
With or without onion, that is the question.
tooltip.spanishdelight.pil_pil_cod.desc: Cod bound in an oil and garlic sauce. Delicious.
tooltip.spanishdelight.croquettes.desc: Crispy on the outside, creamy on the inside.
tooltip.spanishdelight.brava_potatoes.de: Potatoes with an irresistible spicy sauce.
tooltip.spanishdelight.churro.desc: Fried dough ideal for dipping in chocolate.
tooltip.spanishdelight.gazpacho.desc: Cold tomato and vegetable soup. Perfect for summer.
tooltip.spanishdelight.pantumaca.desc: Bread rubbed with tomato, oil and salt.

advancements.spanishdelight.root.desc: Taste the finest dishes from Spanish cuisine!
